trans-unit.source: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
trans-unit.target: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

trans-unit.source: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
trans-unit.target: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

trans-unit.source: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.
trans-unit.target: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}. Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

trans-unit.source: ニコル・ボーラスは手下と犠牲者を区別しない。
trans-unit.target: ニコル・ボーラスは手下と犠牲者を区別しない。
